Package me.kverna.roger.server.service

Class NotifyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kverna.roger.server.service.NotifyService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notifier
    @Service
public class NotifyService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Notifier
    Service layer for sending notifications using Discord webhooks.

        public void notify​(Camera camera,

      • notify

        public void notify​(Camera camera,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   byte[] captureFrame)
        Send a notification to all webhook URLs, using the Camera's name as a title and a given description, and provide a JPEG image of a captured frame from the video that should be saved to the database and passed in the notification.
        Specified by:
        notify in interface Notifier
        Parameters:
        camera - the camera the notification is for
        description - description of the notification
        captureFrame - encoded JPEG image to save and send with the notification

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        webhookUrl - the webhook URL to send to
